body:
Comment 7: 
I don't understand the problem.  Here is the doc:

http://golang.org/pkg/net/#Dial

Or go to http://golang.org/pkg/net/ and search for Dial.
Or run godoc net Dial.

As for changing the constructor heuristic, David generated
a list of things that would be affected, and I don't believe
they would be positive changes.  Dial _is_ a constructor
for net.Conn, so it is listed under type Conn.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
